key.name: editor-location
key.description: Path to your editor binary (code, codium, code-insiders) or 'auto' for automatic detection

key.name: custom-cmd-args
key.description: Arguments to pass to the editors' cli

key.name: prefer-workspace-file
key.description: Whether to prefer the workspace file over the workspace directory if a workspace file is present

key.name: refresh-interval
key.description: Refresh Interval for the scanning workspaces, in Seconds

key.name: cleanup-orphaned-workspaces
key.description: If true, automatically remove orphaned workspace directories.

key.name: nofail-workspaces
key.description: Comma separated list of workspace names (as an array of strings) that should not be cleaned up.

key.name: favorite-workspaces
key.description: Comma separated list of workspace names (as an array of strings) that should be shown at the top of the list.
